$orange: #FB9C6F;

body {
  border: 2px solid $orange;
}

.contain {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  grid-template-rows: repeat(3, 2fr) 1fr 4fr;
  grid-gap: 2px;
  background-color: $orange;
}

.spring {

  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background-color: #FFF;
}

.spring:nth-child(1) {
  grid-column: 1 / 5;
}

.spring:nth-child(2) {
  grid-column: 1 / 3;

  grid-column: 3 / 5;
